actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, H. Rept. 94-806.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the messages of the President of November 18, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-309), and November 29, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-311), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, H. Rept. 94-806) Rescinds budget authorities in specified amounts for salaries and expenses of the Consumer Product Safety Commission and for assistance for local educational agencies in areas affected by Federal activity.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the messages of the President of November 18, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-309), and November 29, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-311), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
